title: Shortest game ever?
body: So me and my mates were in a pre made game in urf and completely smashed them in 9mins 26 secs......is that the fast game ever???{{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}}

replies.body:
the fastest game ever was by that is OP
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dziStDTsFDw
I've won a ranked game in 8mins 15 secs before, just stomped down mid lane
if only that could happen to me {{champion:32}}

Non-URF was 3:21

It’s recorded by ThatsOp on YouTube…

But it was planned by both teams in a custom game so yeah…


Must be even shorter with URF
They could easily do it quicker with URF because all the steroids for AS would be constant, meaning easier towers being taken down.
Those steroids would also be twice as effective.

But the debate then becomes are they the most effective champions because URF.

Azir and Malz would have to be considered, not to mention marksmen would generally be better then the Olaf and co as the AS boost is larger on ranged champs.
it was myself playing kha zix and my friend playing zed
I've had arams that are less than 7 mins.

Nice time DeliriousTaco! I  would probably have a time that short if my games weren't about creating absolute misery for the enemy. I had games last night that were literally 50-10 in kills. We would just stand in front of their base and kill them.

> is that the fast game ever???

No. Probably not even for the mode.
